sentences.en: He sued the police after they impounded his car.
sentences.cn: 警察扣押他的车后他提起诉讼。

sentences.en: I'll need to write you a ticket and impound your vehicle.
sentences.cn: 我必须开罚单给你,并且扣留你的车子.

sentences.en: If you leave your car beside the town hall, the police will impound it.
sentences.cn: 如果你把汽车停放在市政大厅旁边, 警察就会把它扣押.

sentences.en: If you leave your car there, the police will impound it.
sentences.cn: 如果你把汽车停放在那儿, 警察就会把它扣押.

sentences.en: Impound the taxpayer's taxable commodities, goods the value of to the amount of tax payable.
sentences.cn: 不缴纳的,税务机关可以扣押其价值相当于应纳税款的商品 、 货物.

sentences.en: The custom impound the whole cargo.
sentences.cn: 海关扣押了全部的船货.

sentences.en: We'll need to impound your car.

trans.tran_cn: 关在栏中, 拘留, 扣押, 没收
trans.tran_en: if the police or law courts impound something you have or own, they keep it until it has been decided that you can have it back

trans.tran_cn: 将…关起来，扣押，监禁，搁置，保留，蓄水
